Package dev.gamekit.core

package dev.gamekit.core
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Application
    Application is the heart of a GameKit program.
    Audio
    Audio handles loading and playback of sounds in GameKit
    Camera
    Camera controls which part of the game world is visible in the Window.
    Entity
    Entity represent game objects in a Scene.
    Input
    Input handles keyboard and mouse input detection for use in the application.
    IO
    IO handles resource access
    Renderer
    Renderer provides draw methods to draw on the current Window
    Scene
    Scene represents a logical part of your game.
    UI
    UI manages the user interface within a Scene
    Window
    Window which manages the JFrame and image buffers the application is rendered in
